languages.text: On each wielder's Melee attack, wielder's Shield has stacking +2% Block Chance until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: On each wielder's Melee attack, wielder's Shield has stacking +2% Block Chance until the start of their next turn.

languages.text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Если у персонажа в руке щит, он получает +2% к {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блоку{/g} при каждом совершении атаки в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}. Эффект суммируется и длится до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a melee attack, their shield gains +2% block. Stacks and lasts until the start of the wearer's next turn.

If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% block. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% block. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% block. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text: Takan kişi, kalkan kuşanmışsa {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} yaptığında kalkanı +%2 {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g} değeri kazanır. Bu etki, takan kişinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başına dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi, kalkan kuşanmışsa yakın dövüş saldırısı yaptığında kalkanı +%2 bloklama değeri kazanır. Bu etki, takan kişinin bir sonraki turunun başına dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

Takan kişi, kalkan kuşanmışsa yakın dövüş saldırısı yaptığında kalkanı +%2 bloklama değeri kazanır. Bu etki, takan kişinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başına dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text: Si el portador tiene equipado un escudo, cada vez que realice un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, su escudo gana un +2 % de {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloqueo{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador tiene equipado un escudo, cada vez que realice un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, su escudo gana un +2 % de bloqueo. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del portador.

Si el portador tiene equipado un escudo, cada vez que realice un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, su escudo gana un +2 % de bloqueo. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

languages.text: 如果装备者装备了盾牌，则每当装备者进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，盾牌的{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}率都会提高2%。此效果可叠加，持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者装备了盾牌，则每当装备者进行近战攻击时，盾牌的格挡率都会提高2%。此效果可叠加，持续至装备者的下个回合开始。
如果装备者装备了盾牌，则每当装备者进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，盾牌的格挡率都会提高2%。此效果可叠加，持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text: Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, erhält dieser bei jedem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} +2 % {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocken{/g}. Hält bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers an. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, erhält dieser bei jedem Nahkampfangriff +2 % Blocken. Hält bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Trägers an. Stapelbar.

Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, erhält dieser bei jedem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} +2 % Blocken. Hält bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers an. Stapelbar.

Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, erhält dieser bei jedem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} +2 % Blocken. Hält bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers an. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Si le porteur est équipé d'un bouclier, son bouclier gagne +2 % de {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocage{/g} chaque fois qu'il effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}. Dure jusqu'au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Si le porteur est équipé d'un bouclier, son bouclier gagne +2 % de blocage chaque fois qu'il effectue une attaque de mêlée. Dure jusqu'au début de son prochain tour. Cumulable.

Si le porteur est équipé d'un bouclier, son bouclier gagne +2 % de blocage chaque fois qu'il effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}. Dure jusqu'au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cumulable.

Si le porteur est équipé d'un bouclier, son bouclier gagne +2 % de blocage chaque fois qu'il effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}. Dure jusqu'au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cumulable.

languages.text: 使用者がシールドを装備している場合、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行う際に{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}が+2%される。使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がシールドを装備している場合、近接攻撃を行う際にブロックが+2%される。使用者の次のターンの開始時まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。
使用者がシールドを装備している場合、近接攻撃を行う際にブロックが+2%される。使用者の次のターンの開始時まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: Если у персонажа в руке щит, он получает +2% к {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блоку{/g} при каждом совершении атаки в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}. Эффект суммируется и длится до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Если у персонажа в руке щит, он получает +2% к блоку при каждом совершении атаки в ближнем бою. Эффект суммируется и длится до начала следующего хода персонажа.
Если у персонажа в руке щит, он получает +2% к блоку при каждом совершении атаки в ближнем бою. Эффект суммируется и длится до начала следующего хода персонажа.
